name: What it feels like to be Edge
name_original: What it feels like to be Edge
description:
SUMMARY

"What it feels like to be Edge" is the software dimension of the drama. It is a truly heart-wrenching masterpiece about a software forced from its home, clinging to the hope of a better tomorrow for him and its friends and family. Try to flee your destiny in a desprate run against fate.

"I cried everytime" - IGM
"1 like = 1 prayer for this poor guy" - Rock Paper Window

A game made in 40-ish hours during the Global Game Jam 2019 (theme : What home means to you) -->Link for game assets

HOW TO PLAY

You play as the Edgy icon (it looks like Microsoft Edge). Move around with the directionnal arrows and don't get caught by the users cursor! You can bump into folders and images, webpages or texts to survive a bit longer.

We hope you'll have a good laugh playing our game!

CREDITS

Programmers:  Alfred Brisac - Florian Alazais- Morgan Jobbins

Game Designers: Océane Kressmann - Paul Eyheramouno - Guillaume Dartoen    

Graphic Designer: Paul Eyheramouno - Océane Kressmann

Music : Aurélien Demey
